text: Rolde is a village in the municipality of Aa en Hunze, province of Drenthe, the Netherlands. As of 2020, about 3,800 people lived in the village. Rolde also was a municipality until 1998. == References == * Plaatsengids Category:20th-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Settlements in Drenthe Category:Former municipalities of Drenthe Category:Aa en Hunze
title: Rolde
